Service Details: - Offers supervised parenting time, therapeutic visitations and supervised exchanges to families involved with separation, divorce and custody concerns- Endeavours to provide a child-centered, neutral, safe opportunity for contact between children and their parents - Utilizes a strength-based approach with families- Facilitates opportunities for children, parents and/or family members to preserve or reconstruct caring relationships- Provides parenting support and education as appropriate- Also offers co-parenting counselling and family mediation
Hours: Office Hours:- Mon-Fri: 9:00am - 5:00pm   after hours appointments only- Sat: appointments only- Sun: appointments only
Eligibility: Any individual or family member involved with separation, divorce and custody concerns may be eligible for service
Accessibility: Fully Accessible - depending on client's home or other visitation location
